column1: #Text=Located a ways east of downtown , it features the Olympic Stadium and other major attractions .
#Text=This area is served by the Green Line stops between Frontenac and L'Assumption , but Viau and Pie-IX ( pronounced " pea-nuf , " not " pie nine " ) will get you to most of the attractions .
#Text=From downtown , the Ontario 125 runs along Ontario , veering left to terminate at Viau metro next to the Biodôme .
#Text=The Sherbrooke 185 picks up from the end of the Sherbrooke 24 at Frontenac metro .
#Text=The Mont Royal 97 terminates at Pie-IX on the edge of the Botanical Gardens .
#Text=Most of the attractions and restaurants are clustered around Sherbrooke between Pie-IX and Viau metro .
#Text=It 's a 20 minute walk from the entrance to the Botanical Gardens to the Biodome .
#Text=To explore more of Hochelaga , it 's a longer trek not served by metro , but there are plenty of buses and taxis .
#Text=The 85 Hochelaga runs through the center of Hochelaga from Joliette metro to Honore-Beaugrand , at the end of the Green Line .
#Text=Pie-IX 139 and Cadillac 32 run from Sherbrooke down to the industrial riverfront .
#Text=The big four attractions here , the Olympic Stadium , Insectarium , Jardin Botanique , and Biodôme , can all be covered in one trip , but allow a good four hours .
#Text=( Olympic Stadium ) , 4141 ave Pierre-de Coubertin ( east of boul Pie-IX ; metro Pie-IX ) , toll-free : +1-877-997-0919 .
#Text=Built for the 1976 Montreal Olympics , this amazing and controversial building 's tower ( from which the roof is suspended ) is the world 's tallest leaning structure .
#Text=The roof , which could originally be raised , has been replaced numerous times and is the source of great local controversy .
#Text=You can take a funicular to the top of the Olympic Tower for an incredible view of the city .
#Text=Also has a public sports center that includes an Olympic-size swimming pool .

#Text=The area around the stadium has recently become a mecca for skateboarding , BMX-biking , and even snowboarding . the many slanted walls , hand rails and stairs give participants a concrete playground to entertain themselves .
#Text=, 4581 rue Sherbrooke est ( between boul Pie-IX and rue Viau ; metro Pie-IX or Viau ) , ☏ +1514 872-1400 .
#Text=Mid May-early Sep : 9AM-6PM daily ; early Sep-Oct : 9AM-9PM daily ; Nov-mid May : Tu - Su 9AM-5PM .
#Text=The Insectarium is a museum centered on the insect world .
#Text=A few living specimens and many displays , with occasional special exhibits , sometimes offering visitors the opportunity to eat various insect-based dishes from around the world .
#Text=( Montreal Botanical Garden ) , 4101 rue Sherbrooke est ( at boul Pie-IX ; metro Pie-IX ) , ☏ +1514 872-1400 .
#Text=Mid May-early Sep : 9AM-6PM daily ; early Sep-Oct : 9AM-9PM daily ; Nov-mid May : Tu - Su 9AM-5PM .
#Text=Huge and stunning botanical garden , featuring numerous themed gardens .
#Text=Home to the annual Chinese lantern festival every autumn .
#Text=During winter only the greenhouses are open to visitors . $ 19.25 adult / $ 17.75 senior / $ 14.25 student / $ 9.75 child 5-17 / $ 53.50 family .
#Text=Mid Feb-mid June : 9AM-5PM daily ; mid June-early Sep : 9AM-6PM daily ; early Sep-mid Feb : Tu - Su 9AM-6PM .
#Text=The former Olympic Velodrome is now a showcase of different ecosystems .
#Text=( Rio Tinto Alcan Planetarium ) , 4801 avenue Pierre-De Coubertin , ☏ +1514 868-3000 .
#Text=Mid May-early Sep : 9AM-6PM daily ; early Sep-Oct : 9AM-9PM daily ; Nov-mid May : Tu - Su 9AM-5PM .
#Text=( Chateau Dufresne Museum ) , 2929 ave Jeanne-d'Arc ( at rue Sherbrooke ; metro Pie-IX , bus 97 , 139 , or 185 ) , ☏ +1514 259-9201 .
#Text=W - Su 10AM-5PM . $ 8 adults , $ 7 students/seniors , $ 4.50 children 5-17 , free children under 5 .
#Text=( Maisonneuve Market ) , 4445 rue Ontario est ( at ave Morgan ; metro Pie-IX , bus 125 ) , ☏ +1514 937-7754 .
#Text=( Impact de Montréal ) , Stade Saputo , 4750 rue Sherbrooke Est ( Métro : VIau ) , ☏ +1514 328-3668 , ✉ tickets@impactmontreal.com .
#Text=Members of Major League Soccer since 2012 , and one of three Canadian teams in the otherwise U.S.-based league .
#Text=While not as widely followed as the Canadiens , the Impact are still a major force in the city 's sports scene , with routine sellouts of their stadium ( which holds a shade under 21,000 ) .
#Text=Games for which an especially large crowd is expected are played at the Olympic Stadium — typically the home opener , and sometimes major in-season matchups or playoff games .

#Text=As in several other sports , and in social and cultural matters , the Montreal – Toronto rivalry is present in soccer , with Impact matches against Toronto FC among the highlights of any season .
#Text=, 3590 rue Sherbrooke est ( at rue Moreau ; metro Préfontaine , bus 25 , 85 , or 185 ) , ☏ +1514 525-0600 .
#Text=Wide menu featuring French , Québécois , Italian , Greek and fast food dishes in a bistro setting with cute terrace in the summer . $ 5 - 15 .
#Text=, 4255 Ontario E , Montreal , QC H1V 1K3 , Canada
#Text=, 4005 Ontario Est , Montreal , QC H1W 1T1 , Canada
#Text=, 7066 A rue Sherbrooke Est , Montreal , QC H1N 1E6 , Canada
#Text=, 4821 rue Sainte-Catherine Est , Montreal , QC h1v1z7 , Canada
#Text=, 4323 Ontario Est , Montreal , QC H1V 1K5 , Canada
#Text=, 4316 Sainte-Catherine Est , Montreal , QC H1V 1X9 , Canada
#Text=, 4137 rue Ste-Catherine Est , Montreal , QC H1V 1X1 , Canada
